title: A new era of utility wildfire defense is defined by a shift from reactive maintenance to proactive risk mitigation
description: The Wildfire Risk Mitigation & Vegetation Management Symposium taking place at DTECH will bring together real-world utility use cases and the technology driving them.
content: The Wildfire Risk Mitigation & Vegetation Management Symposium taking place at DTECH will bring together real-world utility use cases and the technology driving them.
